result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roberto Xavier Obando

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Roberto Xavier Obando appeared by video.  Attorney Morgan Risseeuw appeared by video for Roberto Xavier Obando.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court on defense request to modify the no contact order to a no violent contact order.  Arguments heard. Court DENIED defense request to modify the no contact order.  Case is adjourned to 11-8-22 at 8:30 am for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defense Motion For Modification of Bond Order, filed.

Defendant Roberto Xavier Obando appeared by video.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Roberto Xavier Obando. Attorney Katherine Kruse appeared for the defendant, by video.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Furents is moving to withdraw as the defendant has hired private counsel. Court granted Attorney Fuentes' motion to withdraw. Attorney Morgan Risseeuw is now the attorney of record.  
Defense is requesting a bail review date to modify the no contact order.  Case is adjourned to 10-11-22 at 1:30 pm for bail review hearing by zoom. 
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 086047,
Payable Number: 1031101,
Receipt Number: 22RP036209,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant Roberto Xavier Obando in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Roberto Xavier Obando appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel was recently appointed and requests status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
 No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with AAL,GMS.
Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Roberto Xavier Obando in court.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 10 for a Pretrial Conference.
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 7/25/22 @ 1p
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 07/25/2022@1pm
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
